Portfolio

  • Vacation Planner

    Complete

    2019

    • javascript
    • react

    A visual calendar that helps map out how to use vacation time.

  • Whiteboard Email

    2019

  • Emoji City Transit

    2019

    A subway dashboard that shows train statuses using emoji.

  • Broker Fee Calculator

    2019

    A calculator that shows what the effective rent would be for an apartment with the broker fee added to the rent.

  • Please Confirm You Are A Robot

    2018

    A website that turns the captcha test on its head and asks users to confirm they are robots.

  • Remixable Space Invaders

    2018

    A live editable version of the arcade game space invaders for learning game design concepts.

  • Record Player

    2018

    Play your old records by taking a picture with this computer vision enabled record player that streams from Spotify.

  • Emoji Wallpaper

    2018

    A generative art project that creates a wallpaper style image from emojis.

  • Glitch to Trello

    2018

    An experiment with the Trello API that will create boards for your existing Glitch projects.

  • Beachcomber Game

    2018

    A beach themed minesweeper clone made with React.

  • DIY Encryption

    2017

    DIY Encryption is a web app that encrypts text in 3 different ways. It uses small prime numbers to generate public and private keys for public key encryption.

  • Spades

    2017

    A multiplayer online version of the card game spades with bot players.
